body_html:
I noticed this in passing because it was next to an issue I filed. Pytorch optimizers do use tensors as keys of the state dict:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/optimizer.py#L134-L140
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/sgd.py#L95
so it appears to be useful, unless I'm misinterpreting something.

body:
I noticed this in passing because it was next to an issue I filed.  Pytorch optimizers do use tensors as keys of the state dict:  
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/optimizer.py#L134-L140
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/optim/sgd.py#L95
so it appears to be useful, unless I'm misinterpreting something.
